1.text: Split the players into teams of 2.

2.text: Figure out what the winning score will be to end the game.

3.text: Remove the jokers from your deck and deal the card evenly.

4.text: Give players a few moments to assess their respective hands.

5.text: Assess your hand to see how many tricks you can win.

6.text: Decide on a "contract" bid with your partner without discussing your hand.

7.text: Play the game in a clockwise direction.

8.text: Collect cards for every trick won.

9.text: Tally your scores after all 13 tricks have been played.
